channel.title: Wondering if the keith mcmillen k board will work with Axoloti
channel.description:
Hello, I'm new to Axoloti and using Midi keyboards as well.
I am currently shopping for a small midi keyboard to use with Axoloti. I have my eye on the Keith Mcmillen K Board, which is similar to the Qunexus but cheaper and with slightly less functionality.
I am wondering if anyone here knows if it will work with Axoloti? I checked the list of verified USB midi keyboards on this forum and the Qunexus is on there... but not the K Board.
Thanks

item.title: Wondering if the keith mcmillen k board will work with Axoloti

item.title: Wondering if the keith mcmillen k board will work with Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @beat
item.description:
@beat wrote:

I recently got one myself and it works. I did not do a lot of testing, but tried to display the velocity and pressure data. It works but getting roughly the same velocity values was harder then expected. The keys are really sensitive.

Read full topic
item.source: Wondering if the keith mcmillen k board will work with Axoloti
